1.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん。私のせいで ご迷惑を|おかけして ごめんなさい。: <%sPC_NAME_1>. I am sorry for the|trouble I have caused you. Until now, I|have lived my life keeping my past a|secret. But I thought that you would|treat me the same even if you knew my|past, so I made the decision to confide|in you. I'm really glad to have met you.

3.よう！ あらためて 礼を言わせてくれ。|ピンチを救ってくれたことも そうだけど|: Hey! I just wanted to thank you again.|Not only for saving my life, but also|for accepting my decision to join SCC to|help my brother. That's really important|to me, so I was very happy to hear|that... Thanks. Let's keep working hard|for the SCC!

5.<%sPC_NAME_1>ってさ ホント なんなの？|魔族だって知ったのに 助け: What's with <%sPC_NAME_1>, really?|What's so important about me that you|came to save me even after you found out|I'm a demon? I've observed a lot of|people in my life, but I've never seen|anyone as weird as you. Well, it's|convenient for me, so keep being you.

6.いっぱい いっぱい ありがとう。||これからも ずっと いっしょ！|||だいすき: Thank you so much.||We'll always be together.|||I love you.

7.迷惑をかけちまって 本当にすまねえ。|今 手紙を書くような 気分じゃないが|どう: I'm so sorry for the trouble I've caused|you. I'm not in the mood to write you a|letter right now, but I really wanted to|tell you how I feel. I don't know what|the future holds, but I know I can get|through it with you. Thanks for coming|to the terrace that time. <%sPC_NAME_1>.

10.<%sPC_NAME_1>。この前は ありがとうな。|俺が お前の恋人に なれる: <%sPC_NAME_1>. Thanks for the other day.|I still feel like I'm dreaming that I|can be your lover. We'll always be|together. Thank you. <pc>.

12.ごきげんよう <%sPC_NAME_1>さん。|あなたが 真実の愛を知った記念に: Good day, <%sPC_NAME_1>. I'd like to|give you a small gift to commemorate|your discovery of true love. For more|information, come to the home economics|room on the third floor of the main|building... Please visit when you can.|           From Love Deliverer, Sugarmel

15.あなたにかけた カモフラージュの|魔法のことで 伝え忘れたことがあるの。|申し訳: I forgot to tell you about the|camouflage spell I cast on you. I'm|sorry, but if you need more information,|please ask Mr. Ribaiba in the staff|room.|            From Admissions Guide Flasse

18.面と向かって 言うのが|テレくさいから 手紙を書くよ。|僕が 過去の呪縛から 解: I was too shy to say it face-to-face, so|I'm writing you this letter. It's thanks|to you that I have been freed from the|spell of the past. I will report at my|mother's grave that I have made a|wonderful friend. Thank you so much for|coming to this school.

19.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>へ。あたしがフウキに|復: Dear <%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>.|Thanks for giving me the chance to come|back to the SCC. It was because of you I|finally had the courage to stand up to|Sinazitch at the last minute. I can|finally tell my family that I'm a free|man. I hope I can help you someday...

20.<%sPC_NAME_1> 俺の告白を|受け入れてくれて 本当にありがとう。|勇: <%sPC_NAME_1>, thank you so much for|accepting my confession. I'm glad I had|the courage to tell you how I felt. I'm|the luckiest person in the world to be|able to go out with <%sPC_NAME_1>. From|now on, let's make lots of memories|together.

22.<%sPC_NAME_1>に 出会うまでは|まさか ここまで夢中になれる人間が|: Before I met <%sPC_NAME_1>, I never|thought there was anyone in the world I|could be so crazy about. As I promised|you last night, you are my eternal|bride. <%sPC_NAME_1>, with the ring of|the pledge I swore my love to you|with...I'll never let you go.

23.<%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN>と あたしは|今日から: <%sPC_NAME_1><%sCMP_CRO_PSN> and I are going to be|lovers from now on! Hehe<heart> So, from now|on, please call me \"Crown\", okay? Let's|be so close that everyone gets jealous<heart>

25.<%sPC_NAME_1>さん……私 幸せです。|私のことが好きだと 言ってくだ: <%sPC_NAME_1>...I'm happy. I was really,|really happy when you told me that you|liked me... I adore you for facing me|with all your might, fighting with me,|and loving me. I may be a novice, but I|will do my best, so please be my friend|for a long time to come.

27.<%sPC_NAME_1>へ||おヨメさんするは もっとあと。|けど いっぱい: Dear <%sPC_NAME_1>||I'll see your wife later. But we get|along a lot. <%sPC_NAME_1>, I love you|very much<heart>
